jp: マッドミートに盾突くのか？
よその店でで食うなよ！

en: Eat at Mad Meats or else!
We got a special deal at Mad Meats!
jp: よそで食ったら承知しねえぞオラァ！
マッドミートは大特価だ！
マッドミートでしか食うなよ！

description.en: Old club that is no longer viable for golf.
description.jp: 古くてゴルフには使えそうにない

description.en: Old club that is no longer viable for golf.
description.jp: 古くてゴルフには使えそうにない

section.jp: シャインコースト・シティ

text.en: Dreams don't die.
text.es: Walang pangarap na hindi kaya abutin.

text.en: However, humans eventually die.
text.es: Ngunit, limitado lamang ang kaya abutin ng tao.

text.en: Will you endure long enough to make your dreams come true?
text.es: Matutupad mo ba ang mga pangarap mo bago ikaw ay maglaho?
text.jp: 君は生き残り、夢を叶えられるだろうか...？

text.en: Phew, I can finally take a break.
text.es: Sa wakas, makakapahinga nadin ako.

text.en: This work is exhausting...
text.es: Pagod na ako sa trabaho ito...

text.en: But it's too early to give up!
text.es:
Pero-- 
Ang sagot sa pagod ay paghinga, hindi pagsuko.

text.en:
If I wanna become a doctor,
this should be nothing for me!
text.es:
Kung gusto ko mag-doktor, 
dapat wala lang sa akin itong pagod!

text.en:
Before I can save lives,
I must be able to make tacos!
text.es:
Bago ako tumulong sa pasyente, 
tutulong muna ako sa gumawa ng mga tako.

text.en: But that's for later! Time for slack off!
text.es:
Saka na nga ako magmunimuni.
Maglalaro muna ako ng ML.

text.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?!?!?!?!?!?!
text.es: ANONG GINAGAWA MO?!?!?!?!?!?!

text.en: I'm taking my break.
text.es: Break lang po, Ma'am.

text.en: What do you MEAN break? That isn't a smoke break!!!
text.es: Anong break-break? Di ka puwede mag yosi break!!!

text.en: But I don't smoke-
text.es: Pero di naman po ako nag yo-yosi--

text.en: Okay, then you can't have a smoke break!
text.es: Edi hindi ka puwede mag yosi break!

text.en: Can't I just have a water break?
text.es: Di po ba puwede mag water break?

text.en: That is not a smoke break.
text.es: Hindi naman yung yosi break.

text.en: Yeah! See, Hazuki? I'm vaping! I can take a break!
text.es: Oo nga! Tignan mo Hazuki. Nag-vavape ako! Pwede ako mag break!

text.en: Nobody asked you about vaping!
text.es: Wag kang maki-epal, Narco!

text.en: Eeeek! What do you think you are doing!?

You're the one crazy enough to think
you can get paid by doing nothing!
But all I want is just a water break!
Alright, then I'll break you!
Kyaaaaaaaa!!!!
Uwaaaaagghhh!

dialogue.notes: Missing the disgusted emotion. Other emotions missing include unhappy and shaking is being weird.

text.en: Hey! Stop right there!

Stop! You better not press the
arrow keys to move around!

Stop! You better not move
the stick to walk around!
I'll be there to punish you!

Don't you dare damage my barrels
by pressing ABUTTONINPUT to attack!

Better not chit chat with
my employees by pressing ABUTTONINPUT!

Hmm? Hazuki, you look frightened.
Found another cockroach?
No! It's something scarier!
And it took down your brother Narco too!
This can't be... my brother...
It couldn't be anyone else other than Tanako!
Y-Yeah... it's our boss...

Ahh. Well, we already know that crying and begging
for forgiveness will just make us explode.
You got no choice but to run, Hazuki.

You can run by pressing the BBUTTONINPUT button
and releasing it.

Got it, Marco! I'll keep in mind the BBUTTONINPUT
is for running!
Good lucky making it back to work tomorrow!

Hey, Hazuki! How's that head of yours?
You know since you always ran into walls?

I gotta run right now
or Tanako will have my head!
In trouble again? How clumsy can you be?
I remember your first day here! Ahahaha!

You keep bumping into walls,
then you lose momentum and start wobbling!

S-Sorry, Tarco.
I-I'll do better not to hit my head into walls!

That's the spirit!
You don't want Tanako to catch up to you!

Do your best to navigate around without
getting stopped by obstacles!
Hazuki!!!
Where do you think you're going!?
I told you to stay where you are!

Don't you dare run by holding and releasing
the BBUTTONINPUT button.

It's punishment time!
I'm coming after you!
Haaaaahhh... haaaaahh...
I'm almost outta here...
There you are!
Kyaa!
Where do you think you're going?
Finding another place to slack off?
I'm not slacking off!

I'm taking a break!
You know, the legal one in the handbook!

The handbook says Smoke Break.
Where's your cigarette, huh?
Please! I told you already I don't smoke!
Isn't it better to drink water as a water break instead?

People who smoke need to smoke!
You don't need a break to drink water!

But water is a basic human necessity!
Taking breaks with water is part of a healthy lifestyle!
Are you seriously questioning our policies?
Am I wrong?

I'm just trying to do what a doctor might say, so that I can
become a real doctor one day.
You work in fast food!
B-But...I need to be able to pay for my tuition somehow.
Might as well use my head now to apply what I learned so far.

Alright then, big brains.
I'll knock your head silly for a reality check.
What!? How did you dodge?
Well, you said you were gonna hit me.
Why, you! Well, this time I'm gonna-
Uuurrrrrrrr...
...Tanako?
Tanako!?
W-What happened?
AAAAAARRRRGHHHHHHH!!!
H-Huh!?

Hawawawawa!!
What's going on!?
Ahahahahaha!
Who's there!?

Ahahahahaha! It is me!
ME!!!!!!

Greetings, Tanako from Tanako's Tacos.
Today, you will witness the power of Knell from Mad Meats!
I'm not Tanako.
What?

Who the heck are you then?
Are you sure you're not Tanako?
I'm Hazuki.
I'm Quibble!
Nobody asked you!
And I'm McSoda.
Sit down, you!
I told you, boys! I'll be the one doing the talking!
Alright, I mean you are the boss.

We're right behind you, though.
We know you suck at convincing people.
Don't you dare mock me!
Besides, I'm not convincing anyone this time.
I'm negotiating!
Hazuki!
Y-Yes?
Where is Tanako?

She's knocked out right now.
Did you do this?

WHAT!? Then that means she ate one of the tacos
we hijacked with our experimental ingredients.

I didn't expect this.
The tacos were meant for the customers!
Hey, boss. Don't you eat our own restaurant's food too?

Yeah, I do but that's because you make really good meat!
After all, Mad Meats is the best in Shinecoast City!

Wow! The boss is really saying this about me?
I knew I'm the best!

I'll let it pass this time because it's that good,
and soon we can make the tacos from here too!
Urghhh...shut up you...
You survived!?
Don't you dare...steal my taco recipe!
It took me years to make a recipe that's both quick and good.
But you... you did something to my tacos today.

Tanako, I'm merely just trying to experiment and
see how I can make the best taste for everyone!
By adding a taste so bad, almost everyone explodes?
Sometimes, you just gotta experiment to see what happens.
You can't find the best solution if you always play it safe.

So if there's anything seemingly dangerous,
I might as well put the risk on my competitors!
Besides, I'm after your taco recipe!

That is, without the ingredients that made
almost everyone explode. Ahahahahahaha!

Wait...
ALMOST...everyone?

You idiot. Not everyone orders tacos in a taco restaurant.
You should have vandalized our burgers too, idiot.

Who in their right mind would order
burgers in a taco restaurant?

People tagging along with their friends that
can't speak up when deciding where to eat.

Sir. The people over there are indeed eating burgers
so they survived our experiment.

Why are they ordering burgers here!?
Fast food customers are so weird.

But we gotta figure out what to do with these weirdos.
If they survive, they're gonna tell the cops.
And then our sponsor will find out and kick us in the shin.
Sir, should we negotiate with them?
Yeah, I'll go do it right now.
Negotiation completed!
What did you do to my customers!?

Just negotiated with them to make sure
they never speak of this.
Now then, shall we begin our negotiations?
Why you!? I'm gonna...
Urrgh...
Tanako!
Ahahaha! Seems like Tanako's Tacos has already lost!
The taco recipe shall now be mine!

Truly we are the strongest local restaurant
so thanks for participating in the Mad Meats takeover.

Now step aside, girl! It's time for Tanako to
taste the power of true local restaurants.
P-Please stop it!
D-Don't come...any closer...to Tanako.

Hah! Do you think a puny pawn like you
can really make a change?
I-If you take another step... I'll f-fight you!

Have you gone mad?
Why in the world would you fight for your employer?

S-S-She's not nice... but she gives me tuition
money so that I can become a doctor.

I...wanna be a doctor.
I want...to save lives. I'll save her.
Young lass...
You work in fast food!
Hawawawa...
P-Please... I'm really struggling for my dreams!
Then let me end your struggles...
Because I will end you!

HOW DO YOU LIKE THAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT!?

What a weak girl.
Let me put you out of your misery.
Goodbye, Hazuki!
NOOOOO!!
What the!? Tanako??
Stay away from her!

Oh, don't tell me the owner of Tanako's Tacos
actually cares about a mere employee.
Of course, I don't!
But I know what you're gonna do!
You're gonna put the blame of the deaths here towards me.

I mean, sure, but you're dying today anyway
so don't worry about it.

You're the one who should be worried!
My dream won't just die here!
Because I'm gonna...
Urrrr...
Pathetic!
Quibble. Just finish them off for me.
On it, boss!
That was close!
You won't get away that easily!
Blast! They got pushed down the hole!
Let's go down and get them!
Sir, I'm afraid we can't do that.
Huh? What's the matter?
Haven't you heard about the underground rumors?

You mean the thing underneath?
Come on, I can beat anything up!

You're really going in there to fight?
Alright, I'll go call a mortician now.

There's no way I'm gonna die easily.
You're just being a coward, McSoda.

What do you say, Knell?
Let's go for it!
I'll actually have to side with McSoda for this one.

There were indeed reports about this while I was researching
about totally unsafe things.

If the news is true and you guys get hurt,
who's gonna make the good food?

I guess you're right!
Gotta make sure our pals get to eat good!

Well, I don't think they can survive down there
so I'd say we did good today.
But sir...
What about the taco recipe?

I'll think about it.
We already did good today, boys.

Let's get outta here for now
and come back for them later.

STOP RIGHT THEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
EEEEEEEEEEEEERRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!
Ugh... it's the cops again.

MURDERING PEOPLE IS ILLEGAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Listen to me, you skank.
I did not kill anyone this time.
There's no dead body of the restaurant owner anywhere.

And the skeletons around here? 
Come on, it's fall season!

These props are absolutely beautiful!
Gotta get spooky before Halloween, you know!

Basically, I'm one hundred percent innocent
and totally didn't commit a crime today!

YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMAIN SILEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEENT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Arrghhh... I told you though
that I didn't kill anyone!
You still destroyed the soda fountain!!
That's property damage!!
Who cares about stupid soda fountains!?
How about I shoot your soda fountain then?

Oh...
You got a fair point there.

And that's why I'm taking you away!
Justice forever!!

No! Unhand me, you worm!!
Aaaaaaaaarrrrrrggghhhhh!!

Is she not gonna complain about the big hole
on the ground that I made?

Well, she got her priorities straight.
Drinks are indeed more important.

Are you telling me she cares more about that
than how awesome my muscles are?

Are you sure you want a scary lady like that
looking at you?

Well, McSoda. Would you rather hang out with that scary lady
or whatever is underground?

Neither. Do you still want to go underground
and hang out there?

Nah. If I go down there,
that means my hands will touch the sewers.

And I'm definitely not gonna let my hands touch
our very delicious meats.
You generally still stink from sweat though.
Hey! I gotta sweat everyday to become strong and sexy!

If Tanako and that girl want to survive the sewers,
they gotta work out as hard as I do!

I guess we better hope they survive though.
We still need Tanako to tell us the recipe.

Don't worry about them for now. 
We still got the boss to worry about.
Yeah, let's get Knell back from the cops.

Ahhh...
That was close...

Unyuuu...
That really hurts...

Nnnhh...
Tanako, are you there?
Ahh!!
Tanako!!
Are you alright!?
Tanako! Please wake up!
Tanako!!!

Gaaaaaahhhh!!
What was that for, Tanako?

I tried to save your butt and you decided
to land your butt on me!

Ahh! I'm so sorry, Tanako!
I didn't mean to do that!

You know, Hazuki.
I'm really in pain right now and that's why...

Urr... 
I don't wanna move anymore.
KYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!
Tanako!! Help!!!!

Ehhh? What do you want me to do?
Fight it?
Yes! Please, Tanako!
Hazuki, I already told you that I don't want to move!
But, Tanako! I can't fight!

Shut your mouth!
I heard you acting tough up there!

I was still very scared!
I just tried to threaten them, okay?

I saw a comment form a cute video that small dogs can
make big dogs back off by acting tough!
So I tried to do the same to make them back off.
Hazuki...
Those guys are not dogs!

But you saw that I still could not win
in a fight against them.

Yes, Hazuki.
But they are jerks with guns, not dogs.

The easy part this time is that you
just have to fight a stupid rat.

But that's a big rat! I'm not touching that!
You do it, please!

Hazuki, I already told you that
I am in no condition to fight!

If you're that much of a scaredy cat,
I'll be giving you advice on how to fight.

Come on, Hazuki.
We gotta get out of here eventually.
Uuuuu.....
F-Fine.

But please let me have the leftover tacos by closing time
once in a while!
Okay. sure. Whatever.
I-If it's for tacos, I will fight.
So come at me, rat!

Walk to the stupid rat
using the control stick!

Walk to the stupid rat
using the arrow keys!
Press ABUTTONINPUT to bonk this maggot!
Nice work!

Oops. Look at their WAIT number.
Approach when it's larger than 0.
Haaaaahhh...haah...
See? That wasn't so bad.
Tanako, please! I don't like fighting!
Come on. That was an easy fight!

I'm still scared!
I don't wanna die!

Hazuki, you're going to have to fight
if you want to get out of here.

Nooooo...
You fight this time.
Hazuki. I already told you that I can barely move.

Please don't tell me I have to carry you.
I'm really not strong.
You think I'm a baby?

Get that thought out of your mind!
Don't carry me. I'll be walking.
You said you couldn't move!
I'll be using the last of my strength to get out of here.
B-But won't it hurt?
Unlike you, I am not a wimp.
I've endured a lot of pain in my life.

From small bruises to big dreams...
Even our worst reviews hurt more than this.
Life is tough, Hazuki.

But if you keep hesitating because you're afraid of getting
hurt, nothing will happen.

You wanna get out, right? Just deal with it a bit more,
and we can get out of here.

Go ahead and lead the way, Hazuki.
I'll follow along.
Gah! There's rocks on the way!
What's wrong with that?
We can't go forward with them on the way.
So? It's just rocks.
They're blocking the path!
Hazuki! Just walk over the stupid rocks!

I don't want to trip and hurt myself!
I might die!

Uuuggghhhhhh...
Are you really that fragile?

Y-Yeah... I don't know why but I get knocked out
in one hit from battles.

I just told you to deal with the pain for now
so that we can make progress!

U....uuuuuu.....
I'm scared...

...Fine. Let's look around for something
to get these rocks out of the way.

Be next to the rat ONLY WHEN
its wait number is larger than 0.
You're in. Time to attack!
Good job!

You gotta look at their WAIT
NUMBER. Approach when larger than 0.

Okay, Hazuki. We got the bomb.
Now block up the rocks.
A...Aa....Aahh...
Hazuki?
...Can you do it for me?
What's wrong this time?

I never used a bomb before!
I don't know what to do!
Just throw it!
E-E-Ehh!? That's too scary!

No, it's not.
It's actually fun if you think about it.
Y-You threw bombs before?

No, but it does sound a little exciting.
Just a little bit.
T-Then you do it. P-Please.
Wha...

Okay, fine. I'll throw the bomb.
See what you're missing out in life.
Stand back. You don't wanna get hurt.

Hah!
Seems like you've breathed your last!
HOW DO YOU LIKE THAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT!?
AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!
What's wrong, Hazuki?
W-We messed up!
How??

L-Look. There's a hole now!
We still can't pass!
Hazuki...
Just jump over it!
Ehh!?
B-But... what if I fall?

Oh, come on.
Do you always have to sweat the details?
I...I just don't want to die.

Hazuki, if you keep hestitating and get left behind,
you're probably going to die!

Sometimes, making the risk is what leads to your safety.
So give yourself some guts like before.

It's not that bad anyway. All you gotta do is press BBUTTONINPUT to run
and simply run towards the ledge to jump.
O-Okay, I'll give it a shot...
The door is locked.
Hawawawa! Why does it have to be locked?

Probably because it stinks and nobody wants
to be down here in the sewers.
I definitely don't wanna be here a second longer.
So let's find a way to get past this door.
Take another look, Hazuki. The lock has a keypad.
Oh? Then we just need the right combination.
Do you know the combination?
Hmm?
Did you...
Yeah, I felt it too.
W-W-What should we do?
Let's stay focused.

The more we worry about that,
the longer we will take here.
O-O-Okay...
We'll get out of here, alright?
Y-Yeah...

INCORRECT CODE.
SECURITY BOMBER INITATED.
The door has been unlocked.

Oh! You actually did it, Hazuki.
Nice job.

Guess I'll actually kinda take back what I said
about your head being empty.
Y-You're actually praising me...?

Don't let it get to your head too much.
Now let's head inside.
R-Right.
Do you know the combination?
The door is locked.
Aaaaaaahhhh! Locked again!

Well, it seems like they really don't want
anyone getting out of this place.
But why is there a need for that?
Beats me. But if I were to guess...
Yeah, that's what I meant.
What do we do!? We're dead!!!
We're only dead if you're too scared to move!
A...Aaahhh...

Come on, Hazuki!
Just hang on a bit longer!
You don't want to die, right?
Y...Yeah...
Then let's hurry up and look around!
There's gotta be something that will get us out of here!
I... I don't wanna die...
The key went in! I'm unlocking it now!
H-Huh?
Hazuki! What happened?
I-I-I can't move my arms!

I'm sorry! My body does this sometimes
when I push myself too much.
Hazuki, just push your arm downwards!
Tanako, I can't! My body joints locked up!
Okay! Okay! I'll do it for you.
What in the world!?

A-Are you guys alright? You two look like
you crawled in pain to ge there.

Don't worry! I don't have any patients right now!
I can fix you right away!
Uuurgggghhh...

Hazuki...the pain is back...
You have to close the door...
I......I still can't move my body...
The door...?
OH NO!
There we go! We should be safe!
W-Who are you?

Who am I? If you don't know who I am,
how did you find this place then?

W-We don't know where we are.
We were just escaping the sewers.
Oh! That explains why my blocked door broke.

Well, good job getting out of there!
First time I've heard that thing chase anyone!
B...Better...start explaining yourself on what's chasing us...
A-Are you...the doctor researching dead specimens?
Whoa, there! Calm down!
First of all, now's not the right time to talk about this.
Look at you two. You look like dead meat!

Let's get you two healed up first!
Lucky for you, I am indeed a doctor!
But I'm not those doctors that research the dead, okay?
I'm just an unlicensed doctor that bought this property!
...Unlicensed? Should...we trust you?

Okay, then go ahead and die.
As if you have any other option.
No! Please! Save us!

You got it! Just stay still.
This may take a while.
All done, Hazuki!
...Huh?
I can move again!

I feel a lot better!
Thank you so much doctor...ummm...?
You can call me John Smith.

dialogue.notes: In game, the character dialogue box states "John Smith", but

text.en: John Smith?

Don't worry about it.
Just call me John Smith.
Well, Dr. John Smith, do you think I'll be fine?

I mostly just had to relax your muscles
and treat a few minor injuries.
But I don't think I can say you're completely fine.

dialogue.notes: Dialogue change: removed comma after the word "but"; moved "completely" after "you're".

text.en: Ehh!?

Ah! Don't worry too much.
You should be okay for the most part.
But I've noticed that you're rather...
Well, I don't wanna hurt your feelings but...
It's okay. I'm always hurt everyday.
Alright. Then you are indeed physically weak, correct?

dialogue.notes: Keep an eye out for the word "indeed". Only because Kneel and McSoda used it. But in this case, it should be fine, just because the reluctance shows through. But you could also reword it to: "So...you're physically weak, correct?" or "So...you're physically weak, right?"

text.en: Yeah, I can't really deny that.

I have a few suspicions as to why you're weaker
than most humans.
But I'll have to look more into this.

I already took a few samples from you,
so I'll let you know later.
You took samples of my body!?
Hey, doc. How about me?

Oh, you? Ahah...
Don't worry about it.
...There's nothing I can do.
...What?

Give me a second.
Let me search something up on the internet to verify.

Wait a second...
You're searching information up?
Are you sure you're a doctor?
Don't you search things up for your job too?

I mean, but you're supposed to be a doctor!
Don't tell me you didn't go to school too.

Geez, do you expect us to memorize every single detail
in reports and books?

For your information, all of my colleagues during my studies
still searched things up.

I've even seen professional doctors whip out their
phones to find info during an operation.

We have tools to find knowledge.
It would be a shame if we didn't use them.

dialogue.notes:
Grammar correction for past tense.

Dialogue modification: from "we got tools to find info" to "we have tools to find knowledge" because you already used info in the previous dialogue.

text.en:
Well, that's a relief.
At least it sounds like you got far with your studies.
Nah, I dropped out!

You dropped out?! How do you even have the guts 
to say that you're still a doctor?

dialogue.notes: Dialogue change: From "How do you even have the guts to drop out and still try to become a doctor" to "You dropped out?! How do you even have the guts to say that you're still a doctor?"

text.en:
I believe in myself! That's the power of being an unlicensed doctor. 
Plus, I dropped out twice!

dialogue.notes:
Dialogue addendum: "I believe in myself!" Feel free to remove or modify that. 

Changed dialogue: from "in fact, I dropped out twice!" to "Plus, I dropped out twice!"

text.en:
Listen, I don't think your internet searches can
save lives here.

Lots of nerds were able to change lives just by creating
things they learned from searching video tutorials, you know.

dialogue.notes: I think the vagueness here is fine.

text.en: Do you even know anyone who did that?

Not personally. Just stories I heard
when I was still studying computers.

But hey! If anything, I learned the secret
on what makes computer experts so strong!

Just become a master at searching up information!
Then you can do everything!
You dropped out though, right?
Yep! Because I wanted to be a doctor instead.
What made you want to do that?

dialogue.notes: Grammar edit: removed "instead", because you already used it last piece of dialogue.

text.en: Because I hate doctors!
But aren't you like, a doctor yourself?

Yeah! A doctor with unparalleled abilities to search
up things online!
But you dropped out again, right?

dialogue.notes: Dialogue modification: from "yet you dropped out again" to "But you dropped out again, right?"

text.en: Yeah, because I hate doctors.
But you're here trying to save us.
I love saving lives!
Then why do you hate doctors?

Oh, cool! I found some info on how screwed up
your body is right now!

You don't gotta say that out loud!
People would hate to hear that from a doctor, you know.

Tch. Why would you even change your whole life around
to become something you hate?
Tanako, what's your job right now?
I run a restaurant.
Have you always wanted to run a restaurant?

No, I never even expected to run a restaurant.
But it happened.
So you're unhappy about this decision?
No! You're wrong!
I haven't given up yet on what I wanted to do.

But I love my restaurant!
It's part of my dream now!
Then you know I have no regrets about becoming a doctor!

dialogue.notes: Grammar edit: from "to become" to "about becoming"

text.en:
People go through transformations in their lives,
and so do their dreams!
There are so many places you can find happiness from!

dialogue.notes: Grammar edit: from "there's so" to "there are"

text.en: Right now, I'm happy that my dream is to save lives.
But becoming something you hate... why?
That's...

Oh! I just found the exact info I needed.
You gotta hear this, Tanako!

It's currently beyond my scope.
It will take more than a week to develop a cure.
Can you just bring me to a real hospital?
As if they have time to focus only on you.

They'll take way longer than a week to research
this new problem.

Can your internet searches seriously take less than a week
compared to their research?
I do internet searches plus other stuff too, you know?
And what are those other stuff?
That's classified information!

Trust me on this. I can find information quicker.
Shinecoast City Hospital is always so busy!

dialogue.notes: Grammar edit: Removed the "since" since that works makes it seem like Shinecost City Hospital being busy affects her ability to search up things.

text.en:
Busy yet never getting answers when it comes to
researching new medical problems...
But look who's the lucky girl!

Normies don't trust me enough,
so I can focus on my only patient, which is you!

Sighhh. Okay, fine.
If you need a week to make the cure, go ahead.
Tanako...
You only have a few days left to live.

There's too much damage to your internal organs.
They're struggling to do basic functions.

You also pushed yourself too much with your
injuries that it became worse.
How many days do I have?
Two days.
No...
...I still have dreams...

Please! You have to do something!
I can't die now!
I already told you there's nothing I can do.
But...
There's someone that can do something.
Take me there now, please!
Oh, no. You're not going anywhere.
Why?

Because that person we're looking for is right in
this very room.
W-Wait. Me?
Huh? How?

Hazuki isn't even a doctor.
She barely finished her pre-med school program.
Oh, she doesn't need to be a doctor for this.
Are you saying that because you aren't licensed?

No, because when I did a checkup on Hazuki earlier,
I realized something.

Despite her being very weak,
she actually has magic potential.
What!? I have magic potential?
I'm doomed.

I can't say for sure how strong her potential is.
But...
If we combine my medical skills and her magic...
We just might be able to heal you in two days!
That's redonkulous...

I don't know any spells!
I don't even have a magic staff or something.

Oh, don't worry about that.
You already have a staff for magic!

Ehh? Do you mean this golf club?
This is not magical.
This is already way better than a wooden stick for a staff!

It doesn't have to be magical to use magic!
You just need a tool!
But you still need to learn a healing spell.

All you gotta do is head to the Priest's Cave
on the east side of town.

Wait! Wait!
Cave!?
I just got out of a sewer!
I don't want to go to a cave and risk my life again.
But, your friend is going to die soon.
...I'm sorry, but I don't think she's really my friend.
Hazuki...
Tanako...I...
I'm really sorry...
But you're...

You're a real big jerk!
Why should I risk my life for you!?
Ghh...

...Yeah, I've been a real jerk,
and there's no way I can deny that.

It's probably too late now.
But if we succeed, I'll make it up to you.

I'll do anything.
Please, Hazuki.
Anything?
Yes, anything.
Okay, then first tell me you're sorry.
I'm sorry.

I can't think of anything else right now.
I'm not really good at this.
But let me gather my thoughts, and I'll tell you later.

Alright, then will you also allow me to have
water breaks instead of smoke breaks?
Yes.
How about letting me eat your tacos everyday for lunch?
Okay.
W-Will you fund my medical school tuition?

dialogue.notes: Is this regarding on top of the payment she's already receiving just by being a worker?

text.en: ...Okay, I guess.
Actually, how about just give your restaurant to me?

Okay, now you're going too far.
I'll do everything except that.
Don't you dare take that away from me.

Aaahh! That one wasn't serious.
Sorry.
Can I still get the tuition part?
...I can't fund it fully, but I'll do what I can.
You should go with it, Hazuki.

Plus, I can also teach you some medical skills
as we do this!

If we succeed, then we made a whole new
medical discovery we could use save people with!

And it means more new patients will visit me.
Ehehehe...

But aren't we using magic too?
Isn't that cheating?

No, that only means you're actually saving lives!
You'll be the first cool doctor on my list!
Alright, then.
Tanako, it's a deal.
Hazuki...
Thank you...

Now don't forget, Hazuki.
It's just to the east of town.

Wait, you still haven't told us about
whatever is in the sewers.
Ah...
Hmm...

No time to lose!
I'll tell you about that if you can make it back!
For now, just keep heading east until you reach a lake.

There's someone there that can take you to the cave
across the lake.
Do you really want a frail girl like me to do this?
Relax. Just pretend it's a research project.

I want a cure for everything.
Don't you too?
It's still scary, but I'll try to make it back.
Just head over to the Priest's Cave on the east.
I'll continue to check on Tanako's health.
We're counting on you, future doctor!
I don't really like saying this but...
Please come back safely.
Tanako!
After all, if you die, I'll end up dead with you.
Nnnghh...
Are you TRYING to die!?
The door is locked.
Save your game?
Heeeeeeeeeeey! Over here!
text.es:
Idiota. No todo el mundo pide tacos en un restaurante de tacos.
Deberías haber destrozado nuestras hamburguesas también, idiota.
text.jp:
馬鹿野郎。タコス レストランで誰もがタコスを注文するわけではありません。
うちのハンバーガーも破壊すべきでした、馬鹿野郎。
text.fr:
Espèce d'idiot. Tout le monde ne commande pas des tacos dans un restaurant de tacos.
Tu aurais dû vandaliser nos burgers aussi, idiot.
text.br:
Seu idiota. Nem todo mundo pede tacos em um restaurante de tacos.
Você deveria ter vandalizado nossos hambúrgueres também, idiota.
text.ch:
你这个白痴。不是每个人都在炸玉米饼餐厅点炸玉米饼。
你也应该破坏我们的汉堡，白痴。

text.en:
What's the rush?
Slow down and eat some ice cream here.
text.es:
Idiota. No todo el mundo pide tacos en un restaurante de tacos.
Deberías haber destrozado nuestras hamburguesas también, idiota.
text.jp:
馬鹿野郎。タコス レストランで誰もがタコスを注文するわけではありません。
うちのハンバーガーも破壊すべきでした、馬鹿野郎。
text.fr:
Espèce d'idiot. Tout le monde ne commande pas des tacos dans un restaurant de tacos.
Tu aurais dû vandaliser nos burgers aussi, idiot.
text.br:
Seu idiota. Nem todo mundo pede tacos em um restaurante de tacos.
Você deveria ter vandalizado nossos hambúrgueres também, idiota.
text.ch:
你这个白痴。不是每个人都在炸玉米饼餐厅点炸玉米饼。
你也应该破坏我们的汉堡，白痴。

text.en:
After all, don't you want to save your memories
once in a while?
text.es:
Idiota. No todo el mundo pide tacos en un restaurante de tacos.
Deberías haber destrozado nuestras hamburguesas también, idiota.
text.jp:
馬鹿野郎。タコス レストランで誰もがタコスを注文するわけではありません。
うちのハンバーガーも破壊すべきでした、馬鹿野郎。
text.fr:
Espèce d'idiot. Tout le monde ne commande pas des tacos dans un restaurant de tacos.
Tu aurais dû vandaliser nos burgers aussi, idiot.
text.br:
Seu idiota. Nem todo mundo pede tacos em um restaurante de tacos.
Você deveria ter vandalizado nossos hambúrgueres também, idiota.
text.ch:
你这个白痴。不是每个人都在炸玉米饼餐厅点炸玉米饼。
你也应该破坏我们的汉堡，白痴。

text.en: Ahh! Welcome!

I knew it was a good idea to move our truck to the crime scene
for new customers.

dialogue.notes: There's a lot of prepositions here. It'll be up to your discretion if you want to change it.

text.en:
My assistant wouldn't agree with me...
uh...whatever her name is.
I said my name is Frannie!
Yeah, yeah. Frankie.

I spent 3 million on surgery, got my memory repaired,
and you're the one with amnesia now.

I don't have amnesia.
Your name is just boring that I can't remember it.
Umm...are you guys open?
Yes! Indeed we are!

What do you wanna get, miss...uhh...
What's your name?

I'm Hazuki.
Can I get three scoops?
There! At least you got a cooler name than my assistant.
You're horrible, boss.
Hazuki, are paying by cash or card?
Shut up, DR!

Hazuki, you're our first customer today,
so you get free ice cream for the week.
Really?
You idiot! She's not supposed to know that!
What? Isn't that part of our promotion?
I can go and send her the coupon right now.

She's supposed to ALSO like our page
and share it among other bad guys!
Does she even remotely look like a criminal to you?
She doesn't, but she smells as bad as one.
A-A-Aaaaaahhh! Sorry! I just got out of the sewers!
Oh! So you're behind the crime incident here!
No! It wasn't me!

I'm the one running away from the criminals and
I had to go through the sewers for that!

Spoken like a true criminal! Can't deny that
you're truly qualified for our promotion.

Congratulations, Hazuki! For the entire week,
you can now get free ice cream from us.
I'm not a criminal!

Very good denial skills!
But you truly can't deny this ice cream!
I-I-I guess...

That's right, Hazuki. Every time you eat our ice cream,
you can save your game.
Yup! So you better come visit us whenever you find us!
That being said, do you wanna save?
What do you think you're doing?!

Oh! I didn't expect to run into the
thug queen today!

I'm just trying to follow in your
footsteps and mug this girl!

Excuse me! I don't mug people!
I *borrow* from people!

Oh! Gotcha!
I'll go shoot her now and borrow from her.
Eeeeeeiiaaaaah!

And what are you going to do with the
one coin that she has, huh?
I guess buy a tiny piece of candy?

Amateur thuggery!
Don't you dare rob broke people!
How do you even know this girl is that poor?
Easy! Because I kept bullying this girl back in elementary school!
She never had lunch money!

dialogue.notes:
Emotion change.

Dialogue change:

From: She always has no lunch money!

To: She never had lunch money!

text.en: Sounds like amateur thuggery to me.

A-Aahhh! Well...
I did get something better.

dialogue.notes: Emotion change: She has the weird "b-but" face with sparkles in her eyes.

text.en: Two pieces of candy?

No. This girl became one of my closest
homies in the world!

Because of that, we got to eat everything 
everyday together!

dialogue.notes: Grammar change: from get to got. Because they haven't hung out in a while, and she's talking about past tense.

text.en:
Except we haven't in years because
I don't know where you ran off to, Hazuki.
Ahh... I was studying to become a doctor...

Yeah, sounds like a life of nothing
but studying. Yeeesh...

dialogue.notes:
Chizuru's emotion is still the same from the previous notes. But it should change here to be neutral.

Dialogue change:

From: Yeah, sounds like a life of doing nothing but studying.

To: Yeah, sounds like a life of nothing but studying.

text.en:
Doctor? That means she probably
has a lot of money now!
No! I can't even afford medical school!!
Time to get your pockets borrowed!
Eeek! Chiruzu, help!!
Nah. You get in there and fight.
A-are you going back to bullying me again?

Nah. I'm just making sure that this time
you're not the one getting bullied.

dialogue.notes: Dialogue change: removed Nah, at the beginning.

text.en: Because that fraud right there will be bullied by you!
Ehhhhh?! I don't know how to bully!
Don't worry! I'll teach you everything.
After all, I still gotta make it up to you, right?
I told you years ago we're already good.

But GOOD isn't EXCELLENT!
That's the worst part when it comes to rhythm!
That's why I gotta teach you how to get on beat today!
Just keep this in mind.

If you press the A button to the rhythm,
you can hit multiple times!

You left the FGC to play rhythm games?
Is that why you disappeared?
Nah, it's more complicated than that.

But the rhythm aspect isn't very complicated.
Don't worry too much.

That's because the rhythm is indicated
with a red and white bar.

Just press A when the line reaches the white area
between the red bars
What does that even mean?

Just hurry up and cheese her up.
You'll see what I mean.
Even I don't understand.

But what I do know is that I'm getting a few coins
from you now!
Prepare your pockets!

Go ahead and attack an enemy.
Your attacks will have rhythm now!

Press ABUTTONINPUT when the lines touch the
white area between the red bars!
Perfect!

You got cheesed up but don't worry!
You'll get the rhythm soon!

You did it, Hazuki!
You're now a bully!
I absolutely don't want to be a bully!

I'm just playing with ya!
You're too nice to be a bully.
Always too nice, in fact.

I-I'm just trying to live, you know.
I don't want to fight.

dialogue.notes:
Slight grammar change:

From: Don't want any fights.

To: I don't want to fight.

text.en:
You sure you can live out here?
So many crazy people around!

How about you then? Am I being crazy
by hearing that girl call you thug queen?

Ahh... That...
Ahahaha...

dialogue.notes: Emotion: "uhhh don't look me like that lol"

text.en: Chizuru. Are you a criminal now?
...Ermm...not really?
Okay, maybe I am.

Chizuru! You promised me when we were kids
that you'd stop bullying people!
Of course! I kept that promise!
Then why are you a criminal?
Because I'm too cool for this town?

Know that just because I'm a criminal
doesn't really mean I'm evil.
Ehh?
I'll tell you another time when you find me again!

You're going so soon?
After not seeing each other in years?

Why not come over to my place, Chizuru?
It's just the house behind you.
Can't! That's what sucks about being a criminal! I always gotta run.
Is this why I couldn't find you too?
Nah! Me killing the evil governor was just earlier this year.
YOU KILLED THE GOVERNOR?!

OH! AAAAAHHHH!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!! OOOOPS!

I said too much! 
Alright, shoot!! Watch out for actual criminals, Hazuki!

Life is quite tough right now.
You almost died multiple times today.

But don't let it keep you from your dreams
of becoming a doctor.
Let's do our best today!
I miss my friends...
I wonder where Mashiro and Suzy are now.
Did they become criminals like Chizuru too?
It's hard to see them nowadays.
Then again, trying to be a doctor takes up so much of my time.

Maybe one day, they'll all come back to kidnap me
for another tournament to lose at.
...I want to see you all again.

Excuse me, do you know where I can talk
to the owner of this boat?
This is my boat.
W-Wait, but aren't you a bit young to operate a boat?
I made this boat!
No way!

Grr!! You'll all regret doubting that I'm going
to be the greatest inventor in town!

Aaaah! I'm sure you're a great person
for making boats early on...
Moron! I'm a crab!
A crab!?? What!?

Are you blind? I'm a crab!
Not a person!
Ehhhhhh!? But shouldn't you have claws?
Then have a taste of my claws, boogerface!

Aaaarrrghhh! Aaaaaahhh!
It hurts!!

Can't believe a moron would come here
just to make fun of me!
Aaaaah! Sorry! I'm not here to do that!
I came here to ask for a boat ride!

Yeah, right! No way I'm letting you on my boat
for being so mean to me!
Sorry! I'm really sorry!
Nuh uh! Buy me a chocolate now!
W-What kind?
Any kind! I don't care!

Just go buy at the 5-Nine convenience store
and pick whatever!
A-Are you sure?
Just go!! Aaaaarrrrggghhhhh!!!!!
Kyaah! Okay, okay! I'm going!
You again!
U-Umm...
I'm not talking to you until you're really sorry!
But I really am...
Where's the chocolate then?
I don't have any...
Hmph!
O-Okay, I'll go get it.
Hmm? It's you!
I h-have it...
Oh?
Here's the chocolate.
...I'm really sorry about earlier.
Aaaaahhh! You got me chocolate!
Miss! You're the best person ever!!
Who are you? I can't believe I met someone so nice!

I'm Hazuki, an upcoming doctor.
I gotta go to the other side for my operation.

Okay, Hazuki! You can depend on Gogogogogogogogogogogo
to cross the waters from now on!
What is Gogogogogogogogogogogo?
That's my name!

That's a real name!?
How many Go's are even there?

Eleven! But everyone screws it up
so my fake dad just calls me Juichigo.
Fake dad?

You're starting to get annoying again!
Get on the boat already!
O-Okay, sorry! I'll shut up.
Where do you want to be dropped off?
Oh, it's you again!
Where do you want to be dropped off this time?

Changed your mind?
Well, I guess this place is kinda cool.
So what's the deal with this cave anyway?
Well, apparently I can learn healing spells there.
Maybe with that, I can be more of a doctor.
So you really want to become a doctor, huh?
Definitely. And you want to keep inventing boats?
Nah. I just invent whatever I feel like.
So why a boat here?
First, I just felt like it.
Second, I heard my real dad was born in this lake.
Here? On this lake?

Duh! I'm a crab, remember?
So my dad is a crab.
I just... don't know if I'll see him again...
Well, I hope you find your missing dad...

Yeah. You better nurse him back to health
once I find him, doctor!

D-D-Don't expect too much.
I'm only a pre-med student.
Here we are, Hazuki.
Just up ahead is the Priest's Cave.
Oh! Have you been inside before?
No! It's really dark in there!
Scary!!
I know, right!?

If you ever get spooked out, just come back
and I'll give you a ride home.

I'll be around anyways since I'm looking for something
in the area.
What are you looking for?

Something boring to you,
but it's cool to me.

If it's cool to you,
I'd want to know what it is.
No! Just go already!
Okay! Okay!

Ah! Welcome!
Dr. DR's ready to serve you by this cave!
Why here next to this cave?
Well, you know. To feed customers, of course.
I don't think there's a lot of people around here.
Hmm... Frannie, can you explain?

Well, if anyone is gonna get out of that cave,
they gotta save, right?
Yeah! Seems like you're going there too, right?
Right... but honestly, I'm too scared to go.
Don't be scared. We got your back.

That's why we're here with ice cream
to save your game.
That being said, you wanna save?
Welcome back, Hazuki! Want some ice cream?
Hey! At least buy an ice cream taco!
Aha! We're almost out of here!
Huh?
Eeeeeeeek!!!
Help me!!
No worries! Dr. DR's got ice cream for you!
No! It's not that!
Dangerous people are headed this way!
And they're going to kill me if they see me!

Oh, interesting!
Frannie, unlock the door for her, will ya?
Yeah! You can hide in our truck so hurry and come in.

Ahh! Sunlight again!
Never liked dark caves.
Sir, but our old hideout was literally underground.
That's all in the past now.

It's great to be able to actually live
normally in the daylight.
I don't think anything we're doing is quite normal.

Doesn't matter. As long as we got a normal looking building
we can always get back to.
Shall we go, McSoda?
Sir, what about Quibble and the rest of our crew?
They'll be catching up soon.
Quibble is still figuring out how can go deeper.

But worry not.
All of them should be picking up more salt and oil.
Yeah. They'll definitely be returning with a ton more.

Isn't this great?
These salt and oil are the highest quality we ever found!
Even I wouldn't have guessed it would be at some lousy cave.

Yes! Now everyone in this town will visit Mad Meats!
Wahahahahahahahahaha!!!
There's no doubting that, sir.

Come! Let us return.
We've been out for too long.
Hungry customers await us!
I kinda want to snack on something myself

Well-deserved thought!
Let's grab some ice cream!

Ahahaha! It is I, Knell!
I have come again!
Yes, we know who you are.

I demand you give us ice cream!
One for me, one for him!
You didn't get ice cream from our friend at the cave?
Oh... ummm...
My apologies. Our boss here shot her.
YOU WHAT!?

She spooked me, okay?
That's on her!

She ran away right after I shot her,
so I couldn't get the ice cream!
I don't care about the ice cream right now!
Is she hurt?

It was too dark there.
I don't think I've even landed a hit.
Can you please stop shooting randomly for once?
Says the terrorists disguised as ice cream merchants!
You got us there...
Well, as long as you don't do that to our friends again.

I'll keep an eye on him
in case he does things hastily again.
Ehh, I guess you guys can go with a penalty today.
Yeah, so that'll be two dollars each this time.
Sure. This ice cream is amazing anyway.
Thanks for letting us save our game again.

No problem. We did dumb things like you guys
so we ain't mad at ya.

We'll be looking forward to your restaurant takeover
of the town.

Much appreciated!
Farewell!
You guys know these thugs!?
Yeah! That's our buddy Knell!
He used to run an organized criminal circle.

But now, they're just reformed criminals
working as a normal restaurant.
Reformed!? These are the guys that are trying to kill me!
Huh? Why?

They're just running a normal restaurant
to make up for their crimes.
I find that hard to believe!
We at least know that they only attack other restaurants.

That's the thing!
I work at Tanako's Tacos.
Oh...
I see. That's why you were there.
I thought you were a thug like us too...
I'm not a thug!

Shall we revoke her bad guy exclusive
free ice cream discount?
Dr. DR, you're being ridiculous.
She was able to escape from their attack.
Isn't that what thugs are good at? Escaping?
Hmm, you got a point there.
Plus, she's planning to work in the medical field.

Isn't the nonsense healthcare costs she's gonna charge
going to be evil enough?

You are so right!
Hazuki is already a villain in the making!

I don't make the rules!
I just want to save people!
I love the way you lie.

Pretty sure Knell will see the thuggery side of you soon
so don't worry about him.
No! I don't want thug friends!

Hazuki is definitely a special thug.
She's very nice.

We'll be wishing you luck whether or not you turn
the cave into your evil headquarters.

I'm not there for that!
I just need to learn magic from there!

Yup! Magic.
Definitely an evil witch in the making.
If you're just starting to learn magic, better be careful.

It's dangerous especially since
Knell's goons are currently inside.
But feel free to visit our ice cream partner in the cave.
She's just as sweet as you are.
Even at scary places, someone can save your game!
Why is the ice cream industry so weird?

Though wings are broken,
they can still fly.

These wings will let you fight
enemies form afar.
You feel a mysterious force.

The power to attack opponents at a distance
is bestowed upon you.

As long as you have wings,
you can make it as far as you need.

If you possess it, jump off the ledge
and see where your wings take you.
It's locked.
Unlocked the door with the key.
Oh, hi!
You found my ice cream stand!
What are you doing here selling ice cream?

Well, there's tons of people
selling ice cream outside already.

So I'm filling in the gaps, since nobody is selling
ice cream in these places.
Isn't it dangerous?
Don't worry. I'm already dead.
You're a ghost!?
Yeah!
W-Why aren't you attack me like everything else here?

I'm one of those weird people that prefers
ice cream over killing people.
Y-Yeah, I guess that's true.
After all, this untapped market is fun!
Want some ice cream? It's only a dollar!
Umm, some doctor outside gave me this coupon...
Oh! So you know them!
This coupon means you're my friend!
What's your name?
I'm Hazuki!

Hi, Hazuki! I'm Ghost!
We're friends now!

You can have ice cream from me for free!
Wanna pick something?

Hands off!
That's mine!
Uwaaaaaaaaaahhh!

Oh, it's you again!
Hazuki, right?

You survived the sewers!
I'm so proud!

Wait, no!
We're enemies, so I gotta beat you up.

W-Wait! No, please!
We don't have to fight!

But you're after something I'm getting.
So I won't let you.

S-Sir, please.
If I don't get that, my boss might die!

Wait. Are you saying the cave's salt
can revive people? Wow...
That book behind you is a salt collection?
Book? What book are you talking about?

Oh! You're after that book behind me
and not this cave's salt?
I just need the book!
Are you sure you're not messing with me?

This salt is pretty darn good.
Might help your restaurant.

The restaurant can't run if my boss dies.
I need the book!
Hmm... I don't think I should just give you the book.
Why?

Well, I can't open this door behind us.
I think this might be an instruction book.

No! That's a book for healing spells!
...I think.
Sir, are you sure it's really just instructions?

Well I tried reading it, but I couldn't understand.
Sounds like an instruction book to me.
Then can you let me read it?

No way. This might be more important to me
than it is to you.
But why? Do you really need it to go beyond the door?

Don't know, but if it opens,
I can probably bring home more ingredients.
Sir. Is it really that important to you?

Are you willing to get more ingredients
if it means someone will die?
Well, does it even matter to you?
Do you really care about your boss?
...I...welll...
Not really...
Haha! Thought so!
Unlike you, serving my boss is the thrill of my life!
So don't get in the way of my dreams!
I-Is that really what your dreams are?
Is that restaurant what you really want in life?
What do you know, nerd?

Knell wants to have the best restaurant
and I'm here for it!
Your puny dreams of making tacos can't compare to ours!
T-That's not my dream!
I love tacos, but I want to become a doctor more!

Sir, if I can have this book and heal my boss,
maybe then...
I can become a doctor!
Bwahahahahahahahaha!!!
You? Become a doctor? With magic?
You really trying to take a shortcut here?
Do you even know what it means to struggle for your dreams?
B-But... I'm still going to save lives!

Bah! Unlike you, I don't need to rely on any magic
to do what I gotta do!
I stay true to myself and my dreams!

Some rookie like you who takes shortcuts
doesn't deserve this book!
Uuu...uuuuuu....sorry to disappoint you.
B-But the s-same goes to you, sir.

You don't have a dream for yourself
so you have to rely on someone else's dream.
Wh-Wha...

Hrm, what if I do have one that isn't just about
the restaurant?
However, my regrets with this dream...
...is why I can't let lousy doctors like you get this book!
So you better not run away!
I'm going to charge in so I can punch you!
P-Please! I don't want to fight you!

There's no escape now.
I won't let you strike me from a distance.

Because I will crush all the foolish doctors
in this city!
...A-Aghhh...
...Impossible...
...I've lifted weights my whole life...

...Am I seriously going to lose to you?
How is this possible?
W-Well, I just stayed away from you.
But why would you fight like a coward?
Because your fists are scary!

What can I even do?
You're too strong!

Fight with dignity, idiot!
Real fighters fight up close.
S-Sorry sir, but that's a quote that only scrubs would say.

M-My friends told me neutral play and spacing
are always important in fights.
Y-You can't lecture me!
Nobody can just defeat the master of a workout routine!
Y-You had your own thing?
Yeah! I even had a gym for it!

Not anymore, I guess.
But I'm always fighting.
S-So you gave up on your dreams?
Hey! I'm never giving up on my muscles!
However, you're too weak yourself.
I KNOW!
But I don't want to keep disappointing myself!
I know I can't do much!
I'm scared!

I'm not someone that can get into fights
or explore dangerous areas.
I sometimes hate myself for this.
I'm always too anxious to do anything.
I'm always too poor to do anything.
But I want to become strong...

Call me a coward,
but I'm doing best with what I can right now!
Y-You just grabbed the book, didn't you?

Why, you!
Only the winner of this fight can get this book!

S-Sorry sir. I admit I'm a coward,
but I need this book now to win against you.
Because...
I want to become a doctor!
D-Did you just heal me?
N-No! I-I didn't mean to.
Umm...
My body got stuck while casting it, so I misaimed.
You got stuck?
Yeah... I literally can't move now...
I m-may have pushed my physical limits a bit too much...
W-Wait, what do you mean?
Hazuki!!!
Hey!!!
Hazuki!
Wake up!
...You coward!
I wanted to fight you, not see you die!
After everything you fought for...
After showing me your strength...
Don't you dare die without reaching your dreams, idiot!
I won't let you do that!
You hear me... Hazuki!?
What should we do next?
text.es:
Idiota. No todo el mundo pide tacos en un restaurante de tacos.
Deberías haber destrozado nuestras hamburguesas también, idiota.
text.jp:
馬鹿野郎。タコス レストランで誰もがタコスを注文するわけではありません。
うちのハンバーガーも破壊すべきでした、馬鹿野郎。
text.fr:
Espèce d'idiot. Tout le monde ne commande pas des tacos dans un restaurant de tacos.
Tu aurais dû vandaliser nos burgers aussi, idiot.
text.br:
Seu idiota. Nem todo mundo pede tacos em um restaurante de tacos.
Você deveria ter vandalizado nossos hambúrgueres também, idiota.
text.ch:
你这个白痴。不是每个人都在炸玉米饼餐厅点炸玉米饼。
你也应该破坏我们的汉堡，白痴。

text.en: Let's go sago!

You should have vandalized our burgers too, idiot.
